title: Ep. 84 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Godfrey
description:
Tickets for The Berty Boy Relapse World Tour are on sale now at https://bertbertbert.com!

SPONSORS: - Use code BEARS for 50% off 2 or more pairs at https://ShadyRays.com. - Get your first visit absolutely free! Go to https://forhims.com/bears. - Get $10 Off Your First Pair of Feetures when you go to https://feetures.com/CAVE. - Get 20% Off + Free Shipping at https://Manscaped.com/BEARS. - Visit https://ritual.com/BEARS to get 10% off during your first 3 months. - Go to https://ShipStation.com, click on the microphone at the top of the page, and type in CAVE to get a 60-day free trial. - Go to https://WHOOP.com and use code “Bears” at checkout to save yourself 15% off today. - Get all the different flavors of Bud Light Seltzer delivered at budlight.com/delivery

This week, Tom Segura's fill-in for Bert Kreischer is comedian and podcast host of "In Godfrey We Trust," Godfrey! After practicing some Spanish, Tom and Godfrey start the show by discussing how crazy the last year or two have been, how terribly Bill Gates is aging, and the nature of the internet. The bears describe their experiences "warming up" crowds at television show tapings, and Godfrey shares his experience doing warm-up for The Cosby Show, and when Cosby caught him doing his Cosby impression! They discuss some of their favorite working comedians today, black culture in America, and a whole lot more!
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
